Name: must_match_active_projects
Description: Only consider projects with active status

Name: cannot_match_blocked_tasks
Description: Exclude tasks with status set to blocked

Name: must_match_available_workers
Description: Assign work only to workers with availability above threshold

Name: must_match_product_owner_availability
Description: Ensure Product Owner is available during sprint

Name: must_match_sprint_has_goal
Description: Only run sprints that have a defined goal

Name: cannot_match_low_priority_features
Description: Do not plan features below minimum priority

Name: must_match_active_backlog
Description: Backlog must be in active/ready status to pull items

Name: must_match_sprint_backlog_effort_limit
Description: Total sprint backlog effort must not exceed capacity

Name: cannot_match_severe_blockers
Description: Exclude items blocked with high severity

Name: must_match_review_feedback_documented
Description: Require feedback documentation for each review

Name: must_match_retro_actions_logged
Description: Improvements must be captured as actions

Name: must_match_team_size_bounds
Description: Team size must be within allowed range
